metadata.description: Community agent plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: community-agent
plugins.description: Core shared library for community agent plugins. Provides storage, formatting, and configuration utilities.

plugins.name: discord-connector
plugins.description: Sync, read, and analyze Discord messages with Claude Code. Includes skills for message syncing, channel browsing, and chat summarization.

plugins.name: telegram-connector
plugins.description: Sync, read, and analyze Telegram messages with Claude Code. Includes skills for message syncing, group browsing, and chat analysis.
